tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following instruments would be used to perform a polymerase chain reaction in a molecular biology lab?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Microtome
X) Autoclave
Y) Spectrometer
Z) Thermocycler
bonus_question: -  17)  – 	A deficiency in which of the following vitamins causes pernicious anemia?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Thiamine [thigh-uh-meen]
X) Retinol
Y) Ascorbic Acid
Z) Cobalamin [co-bahl-uh-min]
